modName: Gatti 07 Siggy Armor for CBBEv3 Royal ReTexture
descriptionHtml:
You need to get the original one http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14546 because this is only the textures. I\'m sorry I forgot to put that there before >_> I uploaded this in a hurry.

I did this as request, hope you people like it :)

You can\'t really see the headwear, I know >_> but my game doesn\'t really cope with the \'showracemenu\' atm, so I didn\'t bother to change the hairdo, sorry xP.

As usual feel free to add your own pictures and tell me what you think :)

Special thanks to LordXerxer for making the request!

[/youtube]

Thank you for the video MrKrossFaith!
author: Messias Mummo
